item.title: New IRS Rules for 2026 Will Allow You to Contribute More to Your 401(k) and IRA
item.description: While high inflation may be painful for American shoppers and households, it also means higher contribution thresholds.

item.title: Current Mortgage Rates: November 14, 2025
item.description: Freddie Mac's benchmark rate for a 30-year fixed-rate mortgage is holding steady, averaging 6.24% for the week ending November 13.

item.title: College Costs Were Flat for Many Years. Now They’re Back on the Rise
item.description: Students may be seeing higher out-of-pocket costs as many colleges hike tuition prices.
